name: Axoria
description: Axoria is a Web3 MMORPG that combines classic old-school gameplay with blockchain integration. Players can battle AI-powered bosses that adapt over time, trade in-game assets and engage in PvP combat. The game features skill progression, resource gathering and a player-driven economy where $AX and NFTs enhance the experience. With strategic gameplay and evolving challenges, Axoria offers a modern take on a nostalgic adventure.
